thread.title: Light rains predicted for UAE today
thread.title_full: Light rains predicted for UAE today

title: Light rains predicted for UAE today
text: Light rains predicted for UAE today Web Report Filed on February 6, 2017 | Last updated on February 6, 2017 at 08.53 am Share More > Vote The weather has been highly unpredictable over the past few days and the day will remain hazy/cloudy today.Today morning the national forecaster raised an alarm about fog formation affecting the visibility less than 1000m in some western areas. They also shared that there was mist in the Liwa region of Abu Dhabi. - UAE WEATHER (@NCMS_media) February 6, 2017 The day will be partly cloudy and slightly hazy at times. The number of clouds could increase over some areas in the night and Tuesday morning, hinting at light rainfall. There will be an increase in relative humidity by night of early morning and mist/fog could form. The sea will be moderate becoming rough by afternoon in the Arabian Gulf and moderate becoming rough by night in Oman sea. - UAE WEATHER (@NCMS_media) February 6, 2017 Share
